parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the zoom level ('''F'''ield '''O'''f '''V'''iew) of the given camera.
<br>
The zoom level is from ''<tt>0.01</tt>'' for the nearest and ''<tt>8.5</tt>'' for the furthest zoom value, with a default zoom level of ''<tt>0.75</tt>''
<br>
The angle of the field of view is ''<tt>atan(FOV)*2</tt>'' radians when in 4:3 aspect ratio. Needs the call of [[camCommit]] to be conducted.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetFov''' level

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> level: [[Number]] - zoom level, range 0.01 to 8.5 (see description above)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[camSetFov]] 0.75;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camPrepareFov]], [[camSetFovRange]], [[camSetTarget]]
</value></part></template>




[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|CAMSETFOV]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CAMSETFOV]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.46|CAMSETFOV]]
